articles.author: Kristin Contino
articles.title: Blake Lively looks like a living Barbie as she reunites with America Ferrera and 'Traveling Pants' cast - Page Six
articles.description: The cast joined together to honor the “Ugly Betty” star as she received a Critics Choice Association Groundbreaker Award on Friday night in NYC.
articles.content:
The pants have turned pink. 
Blake Lively brought out a very doll-like look as she reunited with the cast of “The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants” on Friday night at a “Barbie” event in New York, … [+2421 chars]
